Title: European LNG imports in May down 4% on lower Norwegian supplies
Description: European LNG intakes slid for a second consecutive month in May as prolonged planned maintenance at Norway’s Snohvit plant led most of the decrease.
Author: JS

Title: Philippines’ First Gen sells 60% stake in gas plants, LNG terminal to Prime Infrastructure
Description: Philippines’ utility First Gen has agreed to sell a 60% stake in its Batangas gas-fired power portfolio and LNG receiving terminal to Prime Infrastructure Capital Inc. for PHP 50 billion ($859.9 million).
Author: CK

Title: Qatar's May LNG rebound drives Middle East gains as Oman, UAE exports dip
Description: Qatar’s LNG exports surged in May, boosting total Middle East shipments despite month-on-month declines from Oman due to planned maintenance, and a slip in shipments from Abu Dhabi’s Das Island plant for unclear reasons.
Author: CK
